directions: Combine mayonnaise, salad dressing, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Stir in the coleslaw mix and bacon. Add the tomatoes, and toss gently. Cover, and refrigerate for 1 hour or overnight before serving.
ingredients: 1 (2.5 ounce) package cooked real bacon pieces (such as Hormel™)
title: Blue Cheese Coleslaw
